title: Thank youuu Riot
body:
Finally after 2 years of wanting my long lost Piltover icon I finally have it...I really can't explain how happy I am over an Icon...I really can't. But  I can thank Riot for giving the players a second chance for the icons they missed in the past.
THANK YOUUU RIOT {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body: I did think of you when I saw that recent comment you made about being so sad you didn't get the icon - despite having clicked the button and contacting support.  I really REALLY hoped you'd be able to get it this time round!

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XoQNtGtA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-25T16:25:33.365+0000)
>
> I did think of you when I saw that recent comment you made about being so sad you didn't get the icon - despite having clicked the button and contacting support.  I really REALLY hoped you'd be able to get it this time round!

I got it instantly. When I saw on my missions that the reward was the long lost Piltover icon In a heartbeat I went into a game and instalalocked Camille..(typed top first ) and and....I have it...Q__Q  tearts of joy....Its so beautiful {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

> [{quoted}](name=Quinzley,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XoQNtGtA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-25T17:41:54.959+0000)
>
> Better love story than Twilight.

of the gods..batum tsss...(sorry had to do it )

Yes we need more Pilover related stuff please...also more Caitlyn...

*i have no useful contribution for this topic. just supporting Camille Ferrøs*
